Directions: Use the information below to answer each question that follows.
Content: Mr. Nelson is shopping for fertilizer for his lawn. There are four brands of fertilizer that he is considering buying. Each brand of fertilizer is made up of different percentages by weight of nitrogen, phosphate, potash, and inert ingredients. The percentages for each brand of fertilizer are listed in this table, along with the size of the bag the fertilizer comes in, the area of lawn a bag of fertilizer will cover, and the price per bag.
